name: Ainz
text: Ainz Ooal Gown make appearance outside Great Tomb of Nazarick. Death is here. Your enemies tremble in fear.

choices.name: CZ2128
choices.text: CZ2128 Delta watch outside sky. Some idiot declare war to her master. This isn't cute at all.
Let's erase them all as soon as possible.

uniques: Comment [CZ going back into Great Tomb of Nazarick]
